name: Ancient Adventure
description:
Visit Ancient Adventure at Levi D. Smith Games

Find the eight ancient artifacts in the ruins to become the supreme being!

Items

  • Green Staff
  • Red Staff
  • Green Gem
  • Blue Gem
  • All Seeing Eye
  • Ancient Artifact

For Ludum Dare 36

Subscribe on YouTube | Follow on Twitter | Like on Facebook

  • Windows build tested on Windows 10 64-bit
  • Mac build tested on OSX El Capitan 10.11.6 (right click and select Open)
  • Linux build not tested yet

Post mortem - http://levidsmith.com/ancient-adventure/
